com.nulabinc.backlog4j.api

Interface NotificationMethods

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BacklogClient
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BacklogClientImpl

    public interface NotificationMethods
    Executes Backlog Notification APIs.
